featured.text: The exhibition offers viewers an opportunity to experience and appreciate the breadth of his remarkable artistic achievement.

Following increasing calls for the return of artistic objects that were removed decades or centuries ago, some of the world’s leading museums have signed a declaration that they will not hand back the ancient artifacts to their countries of origin.
From the late 1850s until his death in 1910, Winslow Homer produced a body of work distinguished by its thoughtful expression and its independence from artistic conventions.
She is very artistic and romantic.

other.text: His style faithfully conformed to the artistic traditions of his time.
They say people all over the world have only been able to fully appreciate ancient civilizations because these museums have provided access to these artistic objects.

definition.en_def: Relating to or characteristic of art or artists.
definition.example: She has an artistic flair that makes her paintings unique.
